required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Plantar Plate Repair for Treatment of Floating Toe: Must we Associate it to Weil Osteotomy?
clinical_study.official_title: Plantar Plate Repair for Treatment of Floating Toe: Must we Associate it to Weil Osteotomy?

lead_sponsor.agency: Fundaci칩 Institut de Recerca de l'Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau

clinical_study.source: Fundaci칩 Institut de Recerca de l'Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to assess if isolated Weil osteotomy for floating toe grade II or III provides results that are not inferior to those obtained with the Weil osteotomy associated with plantar plate repair.

primary_outcome.measure: Manchester-Oxford Foot Questionnaire (MOXFQ) score at the end of follow-up
primary_outcome.description: Score obtained at Manchester-Oxford Foot and Ankle Questionnaire (0-100, where higher scores mean a worse outcome) one year after surgery.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 month, 3 months, 6 months, 1 year after surgery
1 month, 3 months, 6 months, 1 year after surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Score obtained at Manchester-Oxford Foot and Ankle Questionnaire (0-100, where higher scores mean a worse outcome)

arm_group.description: Weil osteotomy and plantar plate repair

intervention.description: Open, oblique, distal osteotomy of the metatarsal bone, with screw fixation.
Plantar plate reconstruction at metatarsophalangeal area, using sutures.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 18 years old, minimum
- ability to understand treatment and recovery
- floating toe
Exclusion Criteria:
- age less than 18 years old at the moment of recruiting
- patients who are not able to understand treatment and recovery
- intraoperative diagnosis of plantar plate injury grade 0, I or IV in Nery's classification
- secondary surgery

facility.name: Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau
